styles.css: html,body{color:var(--wp--preset--color--contrast);background:radial-gradient(800px circle at 18% 10%, rgba(255,77,36,0.35), rgba(11,12,15,0) 60%),radial-gradient(900px circle at 18% 72%, rgba(255,77,36,0.22), rgba(11,12,15,0) 65%),var(--wp--preset--color--base)}.wp-site-blocks{background:transparent}.wp-site-blocks>header{position:relative;overflow:visible;border-bottom:0!important}.wp-site-blocks>header *{border-bottom:0!important}.wp-site-blocks>header hr,.wp-site-blocks>header .wp-block-separator{display:none!important}.wp-site-blocks>header:after{content:"";position:absolute;left:50%;transform:translateX(-50%);bottom:0;width:100vw;height:1px;background:linear-gradient(90deg,rgba(255,255,255,0),rgba(255,255,255,0.18),rgba(255,255,255,0));pointer-events:none}.joco-no-global-padding.has-global-padding{padding-left:0!important;padding-right:0!important}.joco-no-global-padding.has-global-padding>.alignwide,.joco-no-global-padding.has-global-padding>.alignfull{margin-left:0!important;margin-right:0!important}.joco-feature-cards .wp-block-columns{align-items:stretch}.joco-feature-cards .wp-block-column{display:flex}.joco-feature-cards .joco-feature-card{height:100%;width:100%;display:flex;flex-direction:column}.wp-element-button,.wp-block-button__link{background:var(--wp--preset--color--primary);color:#000;border-radius:999px;padding:10px 18px;font-weight:600;text-decoration:none;border:1px solid transparent}.wp-block-button.is-style-outline .wp-element-button,.wp-block-button.is-style-outline .wp-block-button__link{background:transparent;color:var(--wp--preset--color--contrast);border-color:rgba(255,255,255,0.35)}.wp-element-button:hover,.wp-block-button__link:hover{filter:brightness(1.03)}.has-secondary-background-color{border:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.06);box-shadow:0 14px 40px rgba(0,0,0,0.35)}.joco-header-links .wp-block-navigation__container{list-style:none;margin:0;padding:0;display:flex;gap:22px;align-items:center}.joco-header-links .wp-block-navigation-item{margin:0}.joco-header-links .wp-block-navigation-item__content{color:var(--wp--preset--color--contrast);text-decoration:none;padding:8px 0;border-radius:999px}.joco-header-links .current-menu-item>.wp-block-navigation-item__content,.joco-header-links .current-menu-ancestor>.wp-block-navigation-item__content{padding:8px 14px;border:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.18);background:rgba(255,77,36,0.10)}.joco-eyebrow{text-transform:uppercase;letter-spacing:0.18em;font-size:11px}
